A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved TFA but this took everything that movie teed up and messed it up royally. There were several prequel level BAD parts -  Leia as Peter Pan\, Canto Bight and Broom kid at the end among the culprits. I actually didn't find any of the plot twists particularly shocking. There was certainly no \"I am your father moment\". I wish just wish it had been madder\, wilder and darker. Instead it felt toothless. Big Bummer. After 40 years i'm not excited for the next episode anymore :(
